archimate:BusinessObject.name: Batch Release Test Specification
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
A Batch Release Test Specification is a pre-determined quality control condition that must be met to enable the release of a particular Product Batch. The results from a equivalent set of Batch Release Tests provide the assurance for release of a Batch.
The Batch Release Test Specification is a sub-type of the ISA-95 abstract object type, Test Specification.
